Providence.St. Brendan School:
St. Brendan School was a Roman Catholic, coeducational, college preparatory school in Riverside, Rhode Island, USA.


== Founding ==
After St. Brendan Parish was established in 1909, it became a priority to build a school that would reinforce the Catholic faith in the lives of the children of the parish as well as give them a well-rounded education in all secular subjects.
